response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product's intrinsic value to me is $12,000. However, considering your needs and how well it aligns with your business objectives, I am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to your organization.", "product_price": 9500}
